Entry.JapaneseText: ホッホッホッ……この部屋は、 一泊一万ガルドの特別室……
Entry.EnglishText: Ho-ho-ho... It's only 10,000 Gald a night for this special suite...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私のような大金持ちにとっては、 マフマフの涙のようなものです。
Entry.EnglishText: For a millionaire like myself, it's as insignificant as the tears of a Muffmuff.
Entry.Notes: Had to use an English idiom for it to make sense.

Entry.JapaneseText: ホッホッホッ……この部屋は、 一泊一万ガルドの特別室……
Entry.EnglishText: Ho-ho-ho... It's only 10,000 Gald a night for this special suite...

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の儀式もさる事ながら、 そちらのお風呂も珍しくて 楽しみのひとつでございます。
Entry.EnglishText: Aside from the inauguration ceremony, I'm looking forward to enjoying the bath in this suite as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: 兵士たちの様子がおかしいが、 城で何かあったのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Something seems different about the soldiers... Did something happen at the castle?
Hey, this is the special suite.

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴様らのような小汚いヤツらが 来るところじゃないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is no place for dirty commoners!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ペロヨン印の風呂おけ』 割と有名な旅の薬売り、ペロヨン氏が 宣伝のために配っている風呂おけ。 よく見かけるが、なかなかもらえない。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Peloyon's Bath Pail - A bath pail that was distributed for advertising purposes by one Mr. Peloyon, a well-known medicine peddler. Although you can find them pretty easily, they are hard to obtain.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『水車式打ち湯風呂』 タキート工務店のオリジナル商品。 浴槽がふたつあり、奥の桶にためられた 熱湯を水車がくみ上げ、手前の浴槽に 移す間に適温にしてくれる。 身体にお湯を当てる事で血行も良くなる。 ただ、頭をぶつける人が後をたたないので、 今のところ、この宿にしかない。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Waterwheel Bath - One of Takito Corporation's original products. The waterwheel pulls up hot water from a reservoir in the back, which is then cooled to a comfortable temperature as it is transferred to the tub in front. The warm water splashing on the bather improves circulation. However, because many guests accidentally bump their heads on it, this is the only inn to feature such a bathtub.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『水洗トイレ』 タキート工務店のオリジナル商品。 渦巻きは右回り。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Flush Toilet - This is an original product of the Takito Corporation. The water swirls counterclockwise.
